Motivation: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
Love: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
Where there is love, there is life.
Life: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
Success: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
Friendship: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
True friends are like diamonds — bright, beautiful, valuable, and always in style.
Wisdom: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
Happiness: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
Courage: Be bold, be brave, be you.
Kindness: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
Kindness is a language the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
Time: Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
Lost time is never found again.
Patience: Patience is not the ability to wait, but the ability to keep a good attitude while waiting.
The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
Change: Change the world by being yourself.
Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
Dreams: Dream big and dare to fail.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Positivity: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
Stay positive, work hard, make it happen.
Leadership: Leadership is an action, not a position.
A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
Learning: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer.
Adventure: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
Hope: Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness.
Once you choose hope, anything’s possible.
Strength: You never know how strong you are until being strong is your only choice.
Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
Faith: Faith is taking the first step even when you don’t see the whole staircase.
Let your faith be bigger than your fear.
Freedom: The secret of happiness is freedom.
Mindfulness: Be where you are; otherwise you will miss your life.
Mindfulness is a way of befriending ourselves and our experience.
Gratitude: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
Start each day with a grateful heart.
Humor: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
Creativity: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
